009
010package imagingbook.pub.threshold.adaptive;
011
012import ij.plugin.filter.RankFilters;
013import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
014import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
015import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilter;
016import imagingbook.lib.filter.linear.GaussianFilterSeparable;
017import imagingbook.lib.util.ParameterBundle;
018import imagingbook.pub.threshold.BackgroundMode;
019
020/**
021 * This version of Niblack's thresholder uses a circular support region, implemented 
022 * with IJ's rank-filter methods.
023 */
024public abstract class NiblackThresholder extends AdaptiveThresholder {
025        
026        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
027                public int radius = 15;
028                public double kappa =  0.30;
029                public int dMin = 5;
030                public BackgroundMode bgMode = BackgroundMode.DARK;
031        }
032        
033        private final Parameters params;
034        
035        protected FloatProcessor Imean;
036        protected FloatProcessor Isigma;
037
038        private NiblackThresholder () {
039                super();
040                this.params = new Parameters();
041        }
042
043        private NiblackThresholder (Parameters params) {
044                super();
045                this.params = params;
046        }
047        
048        // method to be implemented by real sub-classes:
049        protected abstract void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius);
050        
051        @Override
052        public ByteProcessor getThreshold(ByteProcessor I) {
053                final int M = I.getWidth();
054                final int N = I.getHeight();
055                makeMeanAndVariance(I, params.radius);
056                ByteProcessor Q = new ByteProcessor(M, N);
057                final double kappa = params.kappa;
058                final int dMin = params.dMin;
059                final boolean darkBg = (params.bgMode == BackgroundMode.DARK);
060                
061                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
062                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
063                                double sigma = Isigma.getf(u, v);
064                                double mu = Imean.getf(u, v);
065                                double diff = kappa * sigma + dMin;
066                                int q = (int) Math.rint((darkBg) ? mu + diff : mu - diff);
067                                if (q < 0)       q = 0;
068                                if (q > 255) q = 255;
069                                Q.set(u, v, q);
070                        }
071                }
072                return Q;
073        }
074        
075        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
076        
077        public static class Box extends NiblackThresholder {
078
079                public Box() {
080                        super();
081                }
082                
083                public Box(Parameters params) {
084                        super(params);
085                }
086
087                @Override
088                protected void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius) {
089                        int M = I.getWidth();
090                        int N = I.getHeight();
091                        Imean =  new FloatProcessor(M, N);
092                        Isigma =  new FloatProcessor(M, N);
093                        final int n = (radius + 1 + radius) * (radius + 1 + radius);
094
095                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
096                                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
097                                        long A = 0;     // sum of image values in support region
098                                        long B = 0;     // sum of squared image values in support region
099                                        for (int j = -radius; j <= radius; j++) {
100                                                for (int i = -radius; i <= radius; i++) {
101                                                        int p = getPaddedPixel(I, u + i, v + j); // this is slow!
102                                                        A = A + p;
103                                                        B = B + p * p;
104                                                }
105                                        }
106                                        Imean.setf(u, v, (float) A / n);
107                                        Isigma.setf(u, v, (float) Math.sqrt((B - (double) (A * A) / n) / n));
108                                }
109                        }
110                }
111                
112        }
113        
114        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
115        
116        public static class Disk extends NiblackThresholder {
117                
118                public Disk() {
119                        super();
120                }
121                
122                public Disk(Parameters params) {
123                        super(params);
124                }
125
126                @Override
127                protected void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int radius) {
128                        FloatProcessor mean = (FloatProcessor) I.convertToFloat();
129                        FloatProcessor var =  (FloatProcessor) mean.duplicate();
130                        
131                        RankFilters rf = new RankFilters();
132                        rf.rank(mean, radius, RankFilters.MEAN);
133                        Imean = mean;
134                        
135                        rf.rank(var, radius, RankFilters.VARIANCE);
136                        var.sqrt();
137                        Isigma = var;
138                }
139        }
140        
141        // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
142        
143        public static class Gauss extends NiblackThresholder {
144                
145                public Gauss() {
146                        super();
147                }
148                
149                public Gauss(Parameters params) {
150                        super(params);
151                }
152                
153                @Override
154                protected void makeMeanAndVariance(ByteProcessor I, int r) {
155                        // //uses ImageJ's GaussianBlur
156                        // local variance over square of size (size + 1 + size)^2
157                        int M = I.getWidth();
158                        int N = I.getHeight();
159                        
160                        Imean = new FloatProcessor(M,N);
161                        Isigma = new FloatProcessor(M,N);
162
163                        FloatProcessor A = I.convertToFloatProcessor();
164                        FloatProcessor B = I.convertToFloatProcessor();
165                        B.sqr();
166                        
167                        double sigma = r * 0.6; // sigma of Gaussian filter should be approx. 0.6 of the disk's radius
168                        
169//                      GaussianBlur gb = new GaussianBlur();
170//                      gb.blurFloat(A, sigma, sigma, 0.002);
171//                      gb.blurFloat(B, sigma, sigma, 0.002);
172                        
173                        GenericFilter gaussian = new GaussianFilterSeparable(sigma);
174                        gaussian.applyTo(A);
175                        gaussian.applyTo(B);
176
177                        for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
178                                for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
179                                        float a = A.getf(u, v);
180                                        float b = B.getf(u, v);
181                                        float sigmaG = (float) Math.sqrt(b - a * a);
182                                        Imean.setf(u, v, a);
183                                        Isigma.setf(u, v, sigmaG);
184                                }
185                        }
186                }
187        }
188
189}
